summary: Software architect with 25 years of experience in building scalable and maintainable applications.
My hands-on approach helps with balancing the product and technical concerns necessary for success with every aspect of development.
Over the last several years, I have deepened my knowledge and experience with microservices on a variety of cloud platforms.

experience.title: Principal Engineer
duties: Spearheaded the transition from a monolithic architecture to discrete domain services, accelerating delivery cycles and enhancing platform stability through strict type safety and expanded test suites
Supported a platform utilized by large insurance providers and employers that was made available to over 6.5M members
Consolidated cloud providers to reduce cost, latency, complexity, and transient faults
Developed coding standards for TypeScript and Node.js packages

experience.title: Senior Engineer
duties: Directed and developed the cloud-native Notifications and Todos systems with support for multi-channel delivery and dynamic templating
Engineered core platform architecture serving 55 internal development teams, reliably handling 25M+ monthly requests
Co-owned the AWS migration when Paylocity pivoted on cloud providers company-wide
Architected and built one of the first native AWS applications written in Node.js

experience.title: Architect
duties: Collaborated with other technical leadership on the design and implementation of various feature enhancements and bug fixes for our applications and APIs
Assisted stakeholders in defining requirements while designing new features for a new application produced through a joint venture with one of MyHealthDirect's customers

experience.title: Architect
duties: Collaborated with senior technical staff from concept to completion of a cloud-based DDD+CQRS+ES architecture for application development
Developed and supported the core internal NuGet packages used across project teams
Point of contact for the Microsoft Enterprise Agreement and Azure ISV enrollment

experience.title: UI Architect

experience.title: UI Architect (Contract)
duties: Defined best practices for CSS, semantic HTML, and the 960 Grid System for 11 teams
Initiated and contributed to the design and refactor of portions of the application architecture

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
duties: Rotated between lead and contributor roles as required for a variety of successful and high-profile client engagements including Autodesk, Microsoft, Hewlett Packard, and CBS
